metadata.title: BOLENVI Bulldog English Bull Dog 925 Sterling Silver Pendant Dangle Charm Bead For Pandora & Similar Charm Bracelets or Necklaces
features: ❤ MADE JUST FOR YOU: Each piece is designed by hand by our amazing artists and made to order. Each charm has a story behind it and breathes inspiration. So much thought and detail is put into this charm unlike inferior charms sold in the market. One of a kind with you in mind.
❤ MEASUREMENT: The Hole Size is about 4.8-5.0mm and is compatible with Pandora, EvesCity, Biagi, Troll, and Chamilia European bracelets/necklaces. Fits both necklace and bracelets.
❤ INCLUDES: Charm only. Visit our store for high quality compatible bracelets & necklaces. Makes a perfect gift for yourself or a loved one for many occasions.
❤ BEST QUALITY: 925 Sterling Silver. Skin safe, nickel & lead-free, and hypoallergenic. Packaged in BOLENVI trademarked packaging.

❤ ABOUT US: Bolenvi was created with a vision to help people embrace their individuality. To be fierce and celebrate uniqueness. Bolenvi offers a personal collection to fit the unique characteristics that make each and every individual who they are. So express yourself, make a statement and envision something as bold as you.
